defaultCards.title: WOD Attack
defaultCards.description: Professor Johnson assigns a surprise WOD to the enemy. The shock makes them skip their turn and take 25 damage.
defaultCards.funFact: Plays electric guitar in a band called Hardly Strictly Jerry.

allCards.title: X
allCards.funFact: Worked with Steve Jobs at a company called "NeXT Computers" after finishing graduate school. After NeXT was acquired by Apple in 1996, the NeXTStep operating system became the basis for macOS and iOS, the operating systems used in today's Apple computers and smartphones.
